name.label: Device Name
name.description: a user-settable string for assigning the name of the Cato device
name.note: Name defaults to 'Cato_<HW_UID>' at boot, but is not set if name is defined here

HW_UID.label: Hardware Unique Identity
HW_UID.description: Unique hex code for identifying different devices

operation_mode.label: Mode
operation_mode.description: a user-settable integer defining the operation mode of Cato

timeout.label: Timeout
timeout.description: Number of consecutive low-movement seconds before Cato sleeps

threshold.label: Sleep Threshold
threshold.description: Movement level below which Cato starts counting towards sleep

screen_size.label: Screen Size
screen_size.description: structure containing screen height and width in pixels

mouse.label: Mouse
mouse.description: structure containing values defining mouse operation

idle_threshold.label: Mouse Idle Threshold
idle_threshold.description: Value of move speed below which is considered idle. Causes mouse exit. High number = easier to idle out

min_run_cycles.label: Minimum Mouse Runtime
min_run_cycles.description: Number of cycles mouse will always run before beginning to check idle condns

idle_duration.label: Idle timeout cycles
idle_duration.description: Number of consecutive cycles for mouse to observe idle behavior before exiting due to idle

scale_x.label: Horizontal Movement Scale Factor
scale_x.description: Flat multiplier for all mouse movements

scale_y.label: Vertical Movement Scale Factor
scale_y.description: Flat multiplier for all mouse movements

dynamic_mouse.label: Dynamic Mouse
dynamic_mouse.description: Settings for mouse acceleration, please see graphic on Cato wiki
dynamic_mouse.note: For both input and output, Fast > Slow.

input.label: Input
input.description: User movement conditions defining slow and fast head movement for dynamic scaling

slow.label: Slow
slow.description: Rotation speed floor below which scale remains constant

fast.label: Fast
fast.description: Rotation speed ceiling above which scale remains constant

output.label: Output
output.description: Cursor speed output scaling. Slow when input slow, fast when input fast

slow.label: Slow
slow.description: Scale factor at (and below) slowest input speed

fast.label: Fast
fast.description: Scale factor at (and above) fastest input speed

shake_size.label: Shake Size
shake_size.note: size of movement of cursor indicating 'do gesture now'

num_shake.label: Number of Shakes
num_shake.description: Number of times to repeat gesture ready indicator

await_actions.description: wait for previous action to end before reading a new gesture

max_click_spacing.label: Max Click Spacing
max_click_spacing.description: delay after decting a tap to wait for the next
max_click_spacing.note: TODO: add setting preferences for tap intensity, shock, quiet

gesture.label: Gesture Parameters
gesture.description: structure describing gesture collection and cutoff tools

key.label: Gesture Key
key.description: Human-readable field describing Gesture model's names of gestures - indexed

length.label: Length
length.description: Number of samples (max) in a gesture to be fed to Neuton

idle_cutoff.label: Idle Cutoff
idle_cutoff.description: Number of consecutive idle samples leading to gesture cutoff

start_threshold.label: Movement threshold
start_threshold.description: movement required to start capturing gesture. Startup threshold

idle_threshold.label: Idle threshold
idle_threshold.description: Value of move speed below which is considered idle - leading to mouse exit. Low number = more stillness to idle out of mouse

timeout.label: Timeout
timeout.description: Maximum Time to Wait for Gesture Start before returning 'noop'

calibration.label: Calibration (including automatic) Parameters
calibration.description: structure containing both current calibration (trim) values and preferences for auto calibration

drift.label: drift
drift.description: x, y, z gyroscope drift per-cycle - used as trim adjustments

auto_threshold.label: Auto-Calibration Threshold
auto_threshold.description: An movement period with variation below this threshold triggers automatic calibration to remove drift

auto_samples.label: Auto-Calibration Samples Taken
auto_samples.description: number of samples to wait (at below auto_threshold) required to trigger auto recalibratoion

battery.label: Battery
battery.description: DEV TOOL: analog pin values of high and low battery charge [low, high]

low.label: Low
low.description: Value of analog pin indicating discharged battery. Typ. ~23000

high.label: High
high.description: Value of analog pin indicating charged battery. Typ. ~30000

confidence_threshold.label: Confidence threshold
confidence_threshold.description: threshold of gesture confidence probability [0, 1), for Cato to accept gesture and execute command
confidence_threshold.note: Low value -> few dry-fires, more frequent mistakes. High value -> frequent dry-fires, rare mistakes

bindings.label: Bindings
bindings.description: structure linking gestures to actions in different modes

action_key.label: Action Key
action_key.description: Human-readable field describing available Cato actions

gesture_mouse.label: Gesture Mouse
gesture_mouse.description: Operation loop: Mouse movement -> Idle -> Gesture -> Action

clicker.label: Clicker
clicker.description: Operation Loop: Click -> multiple click timeout -> Action
clicker.note: available tap combos depend on number of bindings

turbo_rate.label: Turbo Options
turbo_rate.description: Options for 'Turbo' (repeated, accelerating button presses until cancelled)
turbo_rate.note: TODO: not yet implemented with current button acctions

key_order.label: key_order
key_order.description: dev key for displying key/val's in resonable ordering on webapp
